data.name: Sample - Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed - 2.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Object By Object ID
workflows.description: Returns general information for the specific object of a collection.

arguments.title: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed: Get Object By Object ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Object By Object ID

workflows.name: Get Objects By Collection ID
workflows.description: Retrieve all available objects in a Collection.

arguments.title: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed: Get Objects By Collection ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Objects By Collection ID
Get Objects By Collection ID -> Check Process Response

workflows.name: Get Manifest By Collection ID
workflows.description: Returns manifest information about all available objects.

arguments.title: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed: Get Manifest By Collection ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Manifest By Collection ID

workflows.name: Get API Root Information
workflows.description: Returns information contains title, description, TAXII versions and maximum size of the content body for the specified TAXII server.

arguments.title: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed: Get API Root Information

workflows.name: Get Collections
workflows.description: Returns the list of public/private/shared collection resources to which the user has access.

arguments.title: Anomali Limo Threat Intel Feed: Get Collections

workflows.name: Anomali Limo > Fetch and Ingest
workflows.description: Fetch Collections from Anomali Threat Intelligence Feed

params.output_mode: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Extract Value from Response
Extract Value from Response -> Get All Collections 2
Get All Collections 2 -> Fetch and Create 2
Fetch and Create 2 -> Update Pull Time

workflows.name: > Anomali Limo > Create Record
workflows.description: Create Indicators from Anomali Limo Threat Intelligence Feed

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Confidence",
    "name": "confidence",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default Confidence score to be set for the feeds",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 50,
    "validation": {
       "minlength": 0,
       "maxlength": 100
    }
  },
  {
    "title": "Reputation",
    "name": "reputation",
    "type": "select",
    "tooltip": "Default Reputation to be set for the feeds",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "options": ["Good", "Suspicious", "Malicious", "No Reputation Available", "TBD"],
    "value": "Suspicious"
  },
  {
    "title": "TLP",
    "name": "tlp",
    "type": "select",
    "tooltip": "Default TLP to be set for the feeds",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "options": ["Red", "Amber", "Green", "White"],
    "value": "White"
  },
  {
    "title": "Maximum Age (in days)",
    "name": "expiry",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified here. If specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true
  }
]

arguments.reputation_map: {'Good': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Good') }}, 'Malicious': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Malicious') }}, 'High': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Malicious') }}, 'Suspicious': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('Suspicious') }}, 'TBD': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('TBD') }}, 'No Reputation Available': {{'IndicatorReputation'| picklist('No Reputation Available') }}}
arguments.threat_intelligence_typeofindicator_map: {'domain-name-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Domain') }}, 'file-name': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Filename') }}, 'file-hashes-MD5': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-MD5') }}, 'file-hashes-SHA-1': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-SHA1') }}, 'file-hashes-SHA-256': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('FileHash-SHA256') }}, 'ipv4-addr-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('IPv4 Address') }}, 'ipv6-addr-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('IPv6 Address') }}, 'windows-registry-key-key': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Registry') }}, 'process-name': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Process') }}, 'url-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('URL') }}, 'user-account-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('User') }}, 'email-message-from_ref-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Email Address') }}, 'email-message-sender_ref-value': {{'ThreatIntelFeedType'| picklist('Email Address') }} }

resource.confidence: {% if vars.confidence %}{{ vars.confidence }}{% else %}{{ vars.item.labels[2].split("-")[-1] }}{% endif %}
resource.reputation: {% if vars.reputation %}{{ vars.reputation | resolveRange(vars.reputation_map)}}{% else %}{{ (vars.item.labels[1].split("-")[-1][0]|upper + vars.item.labels[1].split("-")[-1][1:]) | resolveRange(vars.reputation_map) }}{% endif %}

routes.name: Is data only for mapping -> Return Sample Data
routes.label: Yes, For Mapping

routes.name: Is data only for mapping -> Create Record
routes.label: No, For Ingestion

routes.name: Resolve Range -> Is data only for mapping
